author: Mary Gilleece
description:
How did trans and other corrosive woke ideologies take hold? Because we prioritised politeness over honesty, says Mary Gilleece. What began with polite conversation ended with mutilated children and criminalised speech.

The post We Were Too Polite to Stop the Woke Takeover appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: We Were Too Polite to Stop the Woke Takeover

author: Will Jones
description:
Donald Trump has slapped massive 50% tariffs on all goods the EU sends to the US, starting on June 1st. He also attacked Keir Starmer's Net Zero policy, telling him to drill for oil and gas to cut energy costs.

The post Trump Slaps 50% Tariffs on EU – as He Tells Starmer to Get Drilling for Oil appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Trump Slaps 50% Tariffs on EU – as He Tells Starmer to Get Drilling for Oil

author: Sallust
description:
Spanish scientists "were experimenting with how far they could push renewable energy" before the recent blackouts, as blame begins to fall not only on green energy but on the socialist government's reckless mismanagement.

The post Spanish Scientists “Were Experimenting with How Far They Could Push Renewable Energy” Before Countrywide Blackout appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Spanish Scientists “Were Experimenting with How Far They Could Push Renewable Energy” Before Countrywide Blackout

author: Will Jones
description:
Doctor Who star Ncuti Gatwa has been axed by the BBC after just two series and the once popular show has been put on an 'extended pause' amid falling ratings and woke storylines, it's been reported today.

The post Doctor Who Star Ncuti Gatwa “Axed” and BBC Show to be “Put on Pause” Amid Falling Ratings and Woke Storylines appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Doctor Who Star Ncuti Gatwa “Axed” and BBC Show to be “Put on Pause” Amid Falling Ratings and Woke Storylines

author: Laurie Wastell
description:
The sentencing judge in Lucy Connolly's case claimed her previous tweets 'proved' she was a racist ne'er-do-well who deserved two and a half years behind bars. Laurie Wastell investigates and finds nothing of the sort.

The post The Tweets Cited by the Judge to ‘Prove’ Lucy Connolly is “Racist” Do Nothing of the Sort appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Tweets Cited by the Judge to ‘Prove’ Lucy Connolly is “Racist” Do Nothing of the Sort

author: Richard Eldred
description:
On the Sceptic this week, David Frost on Starmer's surrender to the EU, James Price on Britain's dysfunctional state and David Shipley on Lucy Connolly's failed appeal.

The post The Sceptic EP.37: David Frost on Starmer’s EU Surrender, James Price on Broken Britain and David Shipley on Lucy Connolly’s Failed Appeal appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Sceptic EP.37: David Frost on Starmer’s EU Surrender, James Price on Broken Britain and David Shipley on Lucy Connolly’s Failed Appeal
